properties.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity/Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity/Baca County; Eastern Las Animas County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 4:02AM MST until January 10 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Eastern Las Animas County, Lamar Vicinity/Prowers
County and Springfield Vicinity/Baca County.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow and blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING
